body: While goblins' ears are never dainty, these goblins have freakishly large ears capable of picking up even the smallest sounds. Goblins with this racial trait gain a +4 bonus on Perception checks. This racial trait replaces skilled.
name: Over-Sized Ears
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Goblins/Alternate Racial Traits/Over-Sized Ears
